modules.name: Content Quality & EEAT
modules.description: Analyzes content depth, expertise signals, authoritativeness, and trustworthiness markers that AI models evaluate.

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Evaluates crawlability, structured data, page speed, mobile-friendliness, and technical infrastructure.

modules.name: AI Visibility
modules.description: Measures how prominently your brand appears in AI-generated responses from ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity.

modules.name: Keyword Coverage
modules.description: Tracks branded and non-branded keyword performance, including AI search query patterns.

modules.name: Competitor Analysis
modules.description: Compares your AI visibility and SEO performance against key competitors in your industry.

modules.name: Citation Network
modules.description: Maps backlinks, brand mentions, and citation patterns that AI models use to assess authority.

modules.name: Trust Signals
modules.description: Evaluates credibility markers, author bios, contact info, security, and third-party trust indicators.
